metadata.synopsis: Wulbren on the way to free the tieflings.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Do the escape in moonrise, wulbren will say this as he runs to the tieflings.

0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
0.text: Break the wall and go - if the tieflings can't keep up, it's their problem.
0.context: NodeContext: running through the prison, brisk tone, he's annoyed he has to free the tieflings
